Review_Text: Interesting.If you're a film junkie like myself then you'll appreciate the time and effort that Dr. Neil Hammerschlag, James Glancy, Dr. Toby Daly-Engel and everyone else put in to make this happen.I enjoyed it. Not my place to say where it could have been improved. It is what it is.Thank you.

Review_title: A great watch when a Doc is the mood
Review_Text: I nearly passed over "World's Biggest Bull Shark" thinking it might just be more dullery. The flow was easy, it didn't get tedious with boring filler.. And I actually came away having been amazed with some of the studies that came from the encounter...
